sub_title: Senior Software Engineer || React  Native || JavaScript  || Mobile Developer
summary:
Github profile: https://github.com/sjunka
Sergio Junca is a highly skilled Senior Frontend Mobile Developer with a wealth of experience in React-Native interface development, backend data connectivity using REST API, and leading frontend teams.
Currently relocated to Amsterdam in the Netherlands.

Sergio's technical expertise includes using technologies such as React, React-Native, Responsiveness, REST API, ESLinter, SonarQ, Fastlane, UI Libraries Nexus, Jenkins, and Amazon S3. He has also implemented micro-frontend apps in a React Native app, which has improved maintainability, scalability, and productivity while reducing downtime. This technology has become a smart investment for businesses aiming to enhance the user experience.

Sergio's experience in Agile development and his use of JIRA for documentation and Agile practices demonstrate his knowledge of Scrum methodology. He has worked with diverse SCRUM teams in his role as a Senior Frontend Mobile Developer at Nisum (Bank of Chile) and collaborated with Product Owners, QA, Backend Engineers, and Designers. He has also led the frontend team during integrations, testing, and QA phases, offering continuous guidance and mentorship on best practices while providing constructive feedback.

As a Scrum Master, you would be pleased to know that Sergio has managed employee training for Ssr developers over a period of 6 months. He has ensured that his team members receive the guidance they need to perform well, maintain high standards, and keep improving their skills. Sergio has also reviewed and peer coded with colleagues, maintaining good practices and ensuring that all team members understand the importance of quality code.

Sergio's experience shows that he is not only technically proficient but also has strong communication and collaboration skills. He has documented features using JIRA, which has made it easier to identify missing assets, improving the "Ready to Develop" status, and increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of the development process. This has helped his team to work more efficiently and deliver better results.

education.degree_name: Magister en Gestión, Aplicación y Desarrollo de Software

profile_positions.description:
Created React-Native interfaces using internal UX/UI tool kits, adding reusable components from Figma designs. 
Collaborated with a diverse SCRUM team including PO, ScrumMaster, QA and BE, Designer.
Connected and escalated components with backend data via REST API, using Auth Tokens. 
Led the frontend team during integrations, testing and QA phases. 
Developed new features for the loyalty app based on the definition of done.
Reviewed & peer coded with colleagues maintaining good practices.
Managed employee training for Ssr developers over a period of 6 months offering continuous guidance and mentorship on best practices while providing constructive feedback. 
Used technologies 
React / React-Native / Responsiveness / REST API / ESLinter / SonarQ / Fastlane / UI Libraries  Nexus / Jenkins / Amazon S3
	Business Value
By documenting the features using JIRA, the identification of missing assets was made easier. As a result, the "Ready to Develop" status was improved, increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of the development process. 
Using micro-frontend apps in a React Native app improved maintainability, scalability, and developer productivity while reducing downtime, making it a smart investment for businesses aiming to enhance the user experience. 
Integrating UX Figma designs into React components improved user experience, simplified development, and ensured a cohesive interface that aligned with design specifications.
Successfully launched our product to production three times within a 6 month period, demonstrating our commitment to delivering high-quality software on a regular basis.
profile_positions.title: React Native Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Lead the effort to develop an Uber-like mobile app with geolocation, position libraries, maps, background fetch, points of interest, device permissions for camera, location and video. 
- Scaled microservices to leverage the Transistor software library.
- Responsible for managing test environments using Firebase application distribution for Apple test flight and Google console.
- Refactored user interfaces and debugged REST API endpoints.
- Added new components, and design features. 
- Checked functionality for managing different release environments (QA/PROD).
- Created UML diagrams based on PO requirements, added engineering requirements; prioritizing use cases with higher risk.
Technologies used 
Javascript / React Native / React / ReactHooks / MongoDB / Node.Js / Postman / Figma / Github actions / Git / Gitlab / Storybook / Jest / React Testing lib / Material UI / i18n / Redux / Context / Microservices / Transistor Software / Geolocation / API Integration / RESTful JSON / Firebase 
Business Value
- Training to developers to assist them in their professional growth progress.
- Driver features included: turn-by-turn navigation, map routing, points of interest, cargo manager for deliveries, showers, restaurants, parking.
- Executives and QA were able to beta test the application prior to launch. 
- An SDK was created to allow integration with native libraries.
- The company ensured data quality and integrated it into its backend using the new RN mobile app. 
- Promoted autonomy and open communication between the Serbian, US and Colombian teams.
- Great soft skills, able to give constructive and respectful feedback through code reviews.
profile_positions.title: Senior React Native developer

profile_positions.description:
Engineer in charge client's IT product. Encouraged the enhancement of microservices during marketing campaigns, metrics, analytics and product-specific templates. Implemented an up-sell-escalator component that allowed customers to receive personalized suggestions during the checkout process based on their previous purchases and product offers.
•	In charge of keeping the application up and running.
•	Understood and analyzed the requirements requested by the PO during and after meetings with the client.
•	Added features in the frontend and backend of the application. 
Technology/Business Value:
•	Increased profits by creating an up-sell model for managing promotions and offers.
•	Able to anticipate client needs by elaborating product templates for marketing campaigns.
•	Added campaigns based on abandoned products in shopping carts (abandoned carts). Implementing trackers and processing data through Klaviyo.
•	Automatized stock for client products.
